csw.services.ccs

Interface PeriodicHcdController

  • Deprecated. 
    use HcdController

    public interface PeriodicHcdController
    Base trait for an HCD controller actor that checks its queue for inputs and updates its state variables at a given rate.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Tells the controller to check its inputs and update its outputs * Allows changing the update rate of processing.

        scala.Option<Configurations.SetupConfig> peekConfig()

        Returns:
        (undocumented)

      • processAt

        void processAt(scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration rate)
        Deprecated. 
        HCD should call this method once to start processing.

        The rate is available to the HCD, It then sends a message to self to start the periodic processing. Each time the Process message is received, a timer should be started again for the given duration (A repeating timer would risk continuing after an actor crashes).

        Parameters:
        rate - the rate to use for process - default is 1 second

      • process

        void process()
        Deprecated. 
        Periodic method to be implemented by the HCD or assembly. This method can use the nextConfig method to pop the next config from the queue and the EventService API (events) to set the demand and current values.
